(Sorry anybody who has been waiting for my characters to do stuff, I have b=
een REAL busy lately, things have been going on, and I haven't had any prec=
ious time to post.  I'll catch up on some stuff, and try my best to post mo=
re frequently, also, somebody said they needed me for their story, who was =
it??)

::Wheeljack::

     Wheeljack nodded to Gotron.

      "Yap, we bett=
er get it back to base as soon as possible," He said.

     Wheeljack stomp=
ed over to one end of the probe, and lifted it up with his head.

      "Ok=
, now, can you get the other side?" He asked.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Dollen::

     Dollen and GoldenEye walked back to Phobia =
and the others(They are walking hand in hand right, so I'm assuming GoldenE=
ye's coming?).

     "You know love, I think things are going to turn out j=
ust fine," He said, holding her hand.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
::Lavacons::

      Astral flew up into the air, and ordered for the=
 others to follow.

         "We get to kill!!!!  Let's go do some killing!=
!" They all said, following Starscream.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~
::Hakibuscon::

      The battle was over.  And he was never notic=
ed.  Hakibuscon walked away.  Maybe, he could find a better body, any male =
body would do.  He transformed to snake mode and slithered off, hoping to f=
ind another body to transfer his spark into.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Skulletron::

         Skulletron's optics started to open,=
 slowly.  He got up.  He still couldn't see very well.  He wasn't aware of =
his being inside the Maximal base, and he wasn't aware of who he was real g=
ood either.  Skulletron felt around, and stumbled a bit.

      "Ugghhh....=
.Where am I???" He said, trying to see things a little more clearer.
~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Decadel::

        Decadel sat in h=
is underground lair, in his comfy chair.  Man, he had to find a way to wipe=
 out these fools!!  He slammed his fist on the arm of the chair, and then g=
rinned evilly.  Uh oh, he had a plan.
